knimeNode.name: Similar fragments (local files)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Find similar fragments to queries based on the Kripo fingerprint similarity matrix.

intro.p: KRIPO stands for Key Representation of Interaction in POckets .
Find similar fragments bound to similar subpockets as the subpocket associated with the query fragment based on the fingerprint similarity matrix.
intro.h2: Resolving "'kripodb' Python package not found" error
intro.p: This node requires the kripodb Python package.

If the kripodb Python package was not installed then go to https://github.com/3D-e-Chem/kripodb#install and follow the installation instructions. To test if the package is installed run kripodb --version on the command line, it should print a version number if installed.

If the kripodb Python package was already installed then make sure that KNIME is using the same Python executable. In the File menu > Preferences > KNIME > Python make sure the path to the Python executable is the same Python which has the kripodb package installed.
